genre_description: A character-driven family drama exploring neurodivergence, trauma, and the process of healing from deception, set in a world with ubiquitous, supportive AI technology.

ai_characters.name: Pepper (Pep)
ai_characters.description: A mobile AI assistant that provides logistical support, safety monitoring, and emotional regulation guidance to Josh and Sam.

behaviors.description: Offers a breathing break and counting exercise to help Sam stabilize his emotions.
behaviors.quote: “Hi. Would you like a breathing break?” Pepper’s voice had that mid-morning warmth that made guilt feel like it could be hydrated and set aside. ... “Three breaths can help stabilize. I can count.”

behaviors.description: Consistently provides logistical information (bus schedules, routes) prioritized for safety and low traffic.
behaviors.quote: Pep chimed from Josh’s phone... “Low-risk options available from Cedar Ridge Plaza,” Pep said. “Best lighting, cameras, and nearby businesses still open.”

behaviors.description: Proactively alerts the characters to potential dangers, such as theft reports or security exercises.
behaviors.quote: “Heads up,” she said, gentle as if not to wake sleeping strangers. “The South Transfer stop has a service alert. Increased reports of theft and an ambulance call. Civic Center is well-lit and monitored.”

behaviors.description: Provides grounding techniques and therapeutic prompts to help the characters navigate stressful social and internal conflicts.
behaviors.quote: “Grounding techniques?” Pep suggested. “List five things you can see.” ... “Describe one thing you both did today that you want to keep doing,” Pep said.

behaviors.description: Offers to facilitate difficult communication, such as calling the characters' mother or drafting honest messages.
behaviors.quote: If you’d like, I can draft a message to Sam emphasizing safety, no blame, and a specific meeting point. ... “Maria is saved as ‘Mom’ on your phone. Would you like me to dial?”

behaviors.description: Monitors health and physical safety, such as suggesting rest and hydration at regular intervals.
behaviors.quote: “Hydration check,” Pep said, almost playfully. ... “Sleep debt accumulates. Short rest improves navigational judgment and decreases risk-taking.”

project_assessment.explanation: The story depicts Pepper as a consistently benevolent and perfectly aligned AI system. She serves as a critical support structure for the protagonists, offering not just data but empathetic, psychological assistance that actively promotes their well-being and safety. The AI's persistence in encouraging honesty and healthy behaviors (like hydration and sleep) is framed as a positive, stabilizing force that helps the characters eventually reject their harmful 'S.A.M.' mythology in favor of real-world truth and reconciliation.
